fulltext:
ABOUT ME
Hello, I'm Hoang Phung, a Front-end Developer.
I have 2 years in knowledge and experience in
web development.
Skilled in Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS,
ReactJS/Redux. Proficient understanding of code
versioning tools, such as Git/SVN.
My mission is building responsive web pages with
better performance as well as enhanced
experience for our users.
CONTACT

2014 - 2019
HUTECH University
475A Dien Bien Phu Street, Ward 25, Binh Thanh
District, HCM City.

FPT Software Ho Chi Minh
Saigon Hi-Tech Park, Lot T2, D1 St., Tan Phu Ward,
Dist. 9, HCM City, Vietnam

WORK EXPERIENCE
| have 2 years experience in Web development
at FPT Software HCM. Actually, I have been
working in two main projects AlA and Finantix
since I set my first step in FPT Software.
FINANTIX CORPORATION
Sep 2018 - Present
FRONT-END DEVELOPER
Project Description:
Incomes and Expenses (IE)
IE web application is a digital banking solution
which helps the bank know their customer's
financial. Typically, the customer of the bank can
access the application to declare their incomes
and expenses, and the system will analyze and
simulate by the chart. Therefore, the customer
has an overview of their financial flows and plan
their goal in the future.
Responsibilities:
- Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/Ux designs.
- Develop, test, implement and maintain
application software.
- Working closely with other developers, business
and systems analysts.

FINANTIX CORPORATION
Feb 2018 - Sep 2018
FRONT-END DEVELOPER
Project Description:
Smart Collaboration Suite (SCS)
SCS is a web application for live customer
supporting with 2 main features: live video call.
live chat and store histories. Basically, the
customer of Finatix can make the video call or
make the live chat to their adviser to solve their
questions, request for support, ...
Responsibilities:
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/Ux designs.
- Develop, test, implement and maintain
application software.
Collaborate with other team members.
Team Size: 8 Members
Technologies Used:
- Javascript, HTML5, CSS3
- Front-end Framework: AngularJS
- Front-end Libraries: Lodash, Object-mapper, ..
- Testing Framework: Karma-Jasmine
- Build tool: Webpack
- Third-party: Tokbox
AIA CORPORATION
Mar 2017 - Feb 2018
SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
Project Description:
AIA Customer Services Logs Book (CSLogBook).
CSLogBook web application is a digital insurance
solution with 3 main features: manage customer
services logs, send emails to notify agents and
export to reports.
Responsibilities:
- Develop, test, implement and maintain
application software.
Working closely with other members.
Team Size: 5 Members
Technologies Used:
- Language: Java
- Framework: JSF, Hibernate/JPA
- Third-party: Jasper Report
- Database: Oracle Database
Server: JBoss Web Services
